dialogues: Wait for maze to disappear, then move slowly to know the game.
This is the maze and you have to reach '&' avoiding any collision with the walls
At, right top corner, you can see 'Persistence' which decreases with time and collisions.
This is the box. You have to 'THINK INSIDE THE BOX' as it will show you your path.
Did you notice, 'Persistence' decreases at less rate in the box. Go back and check.
Higher the 'Persistence', better it is. If it becomes non-positive, game will end.
Oops, I think you are trapped. Move right to get some help.
Fortunately you have echo location. Press 'e' to hear. Move right
In left top corner, it's shows number of collision, you had in each level.
If not, make a collision by moving down, now it appears.
What will you do, if you are not sure, where the wall is now?
Will you go back to the box? Better way is to hear an echo.
Press 'e' and you can hear louder echo. As the wall approaches, echo will become louder.
Did you notice, echo is coming from right? Ya, echo's direction depends on your last move.
Press 'e', here you can hear a loudest echo from right. That means, there is a wall in right.
By pressing 'q', you can pause the game. With 'p', you can start playing again and with 'q', its ends.
This is the last box, where you can stay and think your next move.
Your score i.e., 'Persistence' will decrease at lower rate inside the box. So, give sometime for thinking.
Did you get the game? Idea is nice right?
Just you have to remember map, use echoes wisely, make minimum collisions and think 'INSIDE THE BOX'
Tutorial is over, now its time to play real game. Reach & to finish.
